sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你要记住这个重要的日期。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào jìzhù zhège zhòngyào de rìqī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois te souvenir de cette date importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to remember this important date.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de jiārén dōu zhù zài Běijīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous mes membres de famille habitent à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: All my family members live in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Duìbùqǐ, wǒ lái wǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Désolé, je suis arrivé en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Sorry, I came late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài lóuxià děng nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je t'attends en bas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm waiting for you downstairs.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yī gè mèimei.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai une petite sœur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have one younger sister.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng mǎi píngguǒ, háiyǒu xiāngjiāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux acheter des pommes, et aussi des bananes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to buy apples, and also bananas.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hòutiān shì wǒ de shēngrì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après-demain, c'est mon anniversaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The day after tomorrow is my birthday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān hěn máng, bù néng lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très occupé aujourd'hui, il ne peut pas venir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very busy today, he cannot come.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zuò huǒchē qù Shànghǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le train pour aller à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I take the train to Shanghai.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jìnqù zuò yīhuìr.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez entrer et vous asseoir un moment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please go in and sit for a while.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngzuò yī tiān hòu, wǒ hěn lèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après une journée de travail, je suis très fatigué.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After a day of work, I am very tired.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ zhù zài nǎlǐ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Où habites-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Where do you live?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 那个女孩儿是我的邻居。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge nǚháir shì wǒ de línjū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fille est ma voisine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That girl is my neighbor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shēnshàng méiyǒu dài qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai pas d'argent sur moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't have money on me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàibiān xià yǔ le, dài sǎn ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pleut dehors, prends un parapluie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's raining outside, bring an umbrella.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuan zàijiā xiūxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le week-end, j'aime me reposer à la maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On weekends, I like to rest at home.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公园里有很多小孩儿在玩。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō xiǎoháir zài wán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'enfants qui jouent dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many children playing in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ chángcháng qù túshūguǎn kàn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais souvent à la bibliothèque lire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I often go to the library to read.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bān yǒu èrshí gè xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre classe a vingt étudiants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our class has twenty students.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我终于找到了我的钥匙。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhōngyú zhǎodào le wǒ de yàoshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai enfin trouvé mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I finally found my keys.
